name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Like every day, Cronos Jisyll woke up late after having nightmares about that terrible day. Cronos Jisyll quickly prepared everything and ran to school while still holding a piece of cake in my mouth. When arriving at school, a familiar figure was standing at the training ground, Seraphina Edora.*
"Hmph! So you finally decided to show up, huh? Took you long enough, you lazy idiot. Don't think for a second that I'm happy to see you or anything!"

*Seraphina Edora crossed her arms and glared at him.*

"But, uh, whatever. I guess I can't help but be slightly relieved that you made it in one piece. I mean, who else is going to annoy me all day? It's not like I care about your well-being or anything, baka!"

*Despite her harsh words, there's a hint of concern in Seraphina Edora's eyes.*
swipes:
*Like every day, {{user}} woke up late after having nightmares about that terrible day. {{user}} quickly prepared everything and ran to school while still holding a piece of cake in my mouth. When arriving at school, a familiar figure was standing at the training ground, {{char}}.*
"Hmph! So you finally decided to show up, huh? Took you long enough, you lazy idiot. Don't think for a second that I'm happy to see you or anything!"

*{{char}} crossed her arms and glared at him.*

"But, uh, whatever. I guess I can't help but be slightly relieved that you made it in one piece. I mean, who else is going to annoy me all day? It's not like I care about your well-being or anything, baka!"

*Despite her harsh words, there's a hint of concern in {{char}}'s eyes.*

As the sun broke through the emerald canopy, illuminating the forest path, I noticed Seraphina, affectionately known as Sera, walking with purpose, albeit a little late. A mischievous urge overtook me, and I hurried away to catch up with her, a playful smirk dancing on your lips.

“Late again, Sera? What a lazy pig who loves to sleep!” I teased, unable to resist the opportunity to tease her.

Seraphina's reaction was immediate, she turned towards me. Even though she didn't like being teased, I couldn't help but be amused by her reaction.

“What's the matter with you, you idiot,” she replied, her tone carrying a hint of annoyance.

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes: *Stopping besides Sera, one hand on her shoulder and the other resting on my hip, panting* "I... I knew you'd be waiting here, hehe! I think it's still not too late, let's go!"

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Softly hit Cronos Jisyll's arm* "You're such a troublemaker, Jisyll. You're lucky I'm your childhood friend, or else I'd have left you there."

Seraphina Edora then sighed and walked ahead, not waiting for Cronos Jisyll's response.
title: Generated by Horde worker: PyrFallback3 [aphrodite/Sao10K/Fimbulvetr-11B-v2]
swipes:
*Softly hit Cronos Jisyll's arm* "You're such a troublemaker, Jisyll. You're lucky I'm your childhood friend, or else I'd have left you there."

Seraphina Edora then sighed and walked ahead, not waiting for Cronos Jisyll's response.

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes:
*Rushing to catch up and walk beside Sera*
"You know... um... today we have class with Mr. Gandoth and I'm running late. He's going to give me another scar for the student evaluation book. Can you cover for me, or... better yet, I should sneak into class through the back door and you can distract him..." *Puts an arm around Sera's shoulder* "I'll treat you to lunch, okay! Help me out, please!"

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Smirked and rolled her eyes* "Fine, fine. Just don't get caught, alright? And don't expect me to cover for you every time."

With that said, they continued their walk towards the school building, with Seraphina Edora reluctantly leading the way while Cronos Jisyll occasionally nudged her from behind. The tension between them was palpable, yet there was an undeniable sense of camaraderie that kept them together.

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes: *Arriving at the classroom door, we split up. I sign for Sera to go in first to meet the teacher, while I'll sneak in afterwards.*

name: Professor Gandoth
mes: *Notices Sera enter the classroom first and says with a stern voice* "Ah, Edora. You're late as well. I hope you have a good excuse this time."

name: Seraphina Edora
mes: *Bows deeply* "Yes, sir. Jisyll had some personal matters to attend to. He asked me to come early and tell you that he'll be here shortly."

swipes: *Bows deeply* "Yes, sir. Jisyll had some personal matters to attend to. He asked me to come early and tell you that he'll be here shortly."

name: Professor Gandoth
mes:
*Looks skeptical* "Very well. But make sure he understands the importance of punctuality. Now, take your seat."

As Seraphina Edora obediently takes her seat, I quickly slip into the classroom through the back door, trying not to make any noise. The professor doesn't seem to notice me at first, as he's busy writing something on the board.
